name: Triad's Tomb
description:
A card game RPG where you play as a teenage girl and her two sentient weapons. Destroy an evil lich and purify the tomb of an ancient hero!

Play as

AEGIS BANE, protector of innocents

BLOOD AVOW, smiter of villainy

and Laurelai, a fourteen year old girl who found  these two while working on her family's potato farm.

Developed for GMTK Jam 2021 by a team of 4 in 48 hours! All we had to start was a rough idea (card game RPG with three party members) and some code from a previous project. All art and music was made during the jam.

Brian Mackenzie: Project lead, coding, design

Nigel Swenson: Coding, music, design

Ryan Quick: Coding, enemy design

Meghan Grant: Art, UI, story

Known bugs and issues:

Resizing the window can make things a little funky.

After using the Card Draw spell, sometimes characters draw 1 card instead of 2 on a later turn
